name: Cat/Cow
description: On hands and knees, alternates between curving the back/pelvis upward (like an angry cat) and curving them downward, stretching the muscles of the hips, back, abdomen, chest, and lungs
benefits: Tones the gastrointestinal tract and muscles surrounding the female reproductive system, helps relieve stress from menstrual cramps, lower back pain and sciatica

name: Plank
description: On hands and toes in the push-up position, tightening abs, glutes, muscles in the back and legs
benefits: Tones and strengthens the core for healthy posture, balance and coordination

name: Bridge
description: On back with feet flat on mat, knees up, extending navel towards the ceiling
benefits: A gentle start to spine extensions, improving the mobility of the spine and countering the effects of too much sitting

name: Sukhasana
description: Seated with legs crossed, shoulders and head relaxed, hands on knees, focusing on deep, even breath
benefits: Improves concentration, flexibility of lower extremeties, including hips, and stability

name: Tree
description: Standing, one foot balance for developing stablity with the core and connection with the earth
benefits: helps improve posture and provides stability to the pelvis, srengthening the ankles and legs, elongating the spine and improving flexibity and balance

name: Chair
description: Standing and squating into a position as if seated in a chair
benefits: Strengthens the ankles, thighs, calves, and spine, stretches shoulders and chest, stimulates the abdominal organs, diaphragm and heart

name: Extended Side Angle
description: Standing and twisting with feet apart, leaning toward one knee, then the other
benefits: Stretches and strengthens the legs, knees, and ankles, increases stamina and stimulates the abdominal organs, as well as increasing physical balance

name: Lotus
description: Laying on belly and raising head and chest, and feet and legs off of the mat
benefits: Imporoves function of intestine and appetite, strengthens the thighs and abdominal muscles, and improves blood supply to lower back muscles

name: Downward Facing Dog
description: On hands and knees, pushing hips up
benefits: Helps calm the mind, relieve stress as well as energize the body, stretching the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands

name: Cobra
description: from belly, gently bringing the chest up
benefits: Increases the mobility of the spine, strenghtens spinal support muscles, and helps relieve back pain, opens the chest and front of the body
